sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_weapon_quality"> <x_176383_star_wars_weapon_quality action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>Some weapons deal Stun damage instead of regular damage. In this case, the weapon deals damage as strain instead of wounds. This damage is still reduced by a target's soak.   A variant of this is a Stun setting. As a free action, the wielder can choose to switch the setting of his weapon to "Stun." In this case, it does stun damage as described above. When weapons with a stun setting are used to deal stun damage, their range changes to short and cannot be increased.</description> <name>Stun Damage (Passive)</name> <number>WQ0001024</number> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 05:11:26</sys_created_on> <sys_id>466f9c682fd46450e0f497eef699b6f1</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 05:11:26</sys_updated_on> </x_176383_star_wars_weapon_quality> </record_update>
